description:
Better than multiple pairs of socks. Doubling up on socks is better than nothing, but the Wölvhammer winter cycling boots add the kind of warmth that only a boot can. Purpose-built for riding in wet and cold winter weather, these boots keep the elements out and the heat in. The durable upper is backed with a waterproof-breathable membrane that can stand up to even the wettest days. The internal liner is removable and uses multiple types of insulation to keep your feet happy. A BOA® closure system and broad strap let you fine tune your fit, even with gloves on. And the stiffened midsole ensures efficient power transfer as spin your way along snowy trails and bike lanes.

  • Hardwearing synthetic leather upper is perforated for added breathability
  • Waterproof-breathable membrane construction
  • Removable inner insulated boot uses Aerogel insulation underfoot and 200g of Primaloft® synthetic insulation around the foot
  • BOA® M4 closure system offers a refined fit and easy adjustment on the fly
  • Hook and loop strap secures the upper boot, sealing out the elements
  • Fibreglass reinforced nylon composite midsole offers support, impact resistance and efficient power transfer
  • Protective toecap
  • Rubber outsole features micro-glass inserts for grip on icy surfaces
  • Built on a wide performance last for a comfortable, stable platform
  • Compatible with 2-bolt SPD cleat interfaces
  • Reflective details help keep you seen
  • 45NRTH recommends these shoes for -18° to -4°C
name: 45NRTH Wolvhammer Winter Cycling Boots - Unisex
